name: OBOH - Out of Body, Out of Home
name_original: OBOH - Out of Body, Out of Home
description:
This game was originally created during the GMTK 2020 48hr Game Jam, check out the 48hr edition here!

Story: - Your mad science has finally caught up to you, the rocket propelled vacuum cleaner was a step to far and when it activated it knocked you right out of your body! Now it's out of control and taking  your house and your body with it, use your new found spectral terraforming powers to keep your house intact and body alive. Controls: - Use your mouse to click anywhere on the ground to temporarily raise it, use this raised terrain to push the vacuum right or left to steer the house to safety. Can't turn fast enough to avoid a hazard? Quickly raise the terrain under the house to launch it into the skies and over it's impending doom! Goal: - Gain score by narrowly avoiding obstacles and grinding along them, or by jumping over them, however take care, the higher your score the faster the vacuum moves. - House health is displayed in the upper-left hand corner, hitting rocks and fallen trees will damage it, picking up boxes of supplies will fix it up. There's no time to waste! Stay in control as long as you can and keep both your homes safe!
